member.name: T:Cake.MarkdownToPdf.MarkdownToPdfAliases
member.summary: Contains functionality to convert markdown to pdf files

member.name: M:Cake.MarkdownToPdf.MarkdownToPdfAliases.MarkdownFileToPdf(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Converts a markdown file to pdf file.
member.param: The name of the pdf file to create.
